name: Doodle Car Racing - Zipcar Loop Drive
name_original: Doodle Car Racing - Zipcar Loop Drive
description:
Doodle Car Racing - Free is a Doodle style top down CarXtreme(CarX) driving game. It's funny and addictive which you'll think the game is so unique comparing with other driving games.

Simple control, just press the gas pedal to speed up and press the direction button to make the car move in naturalmotion. Press brake to stop the carx!

Need for speed just hold the gas pedal! The most wanted is speed! Rush!

Items/Weapons are supported during the race. You can fire a pencil/bullet to attack opponent's cars. For some special items, you can even enlarge your car to run over the other cars!

To unlock the next stage, you need to play the Championship mode (on either one difficulty) and get gold cup (1st) in the last stage you unlocked.

To unlock Dark mode, you need to play the Championship mode (on either one difficulty) and get gold cups (1st) in ALL stages.

Featuring:
-Doodle style
-5 different environments
-25 unique tracks
-7 items/weapons can pickup and 2 can be held! (most wanted)
-Use prop to become big camaro car and crush other carx!
-AI opponent carx
-Single race (solo/vs CPU) or Championship mode
-Easy, Normal, Hard, Nightmare (need for speed) difficulty settings
-Hidden Dark mode
-Portrait/Landscape mode
-Control by touch
-Auto gas option
-items/weapons on/off option
-Saved best time for each track

If you are a super car racing fan, you will accept the impossible racing mission, and you won't miss this funny cart mania game
